4306970.name: GALAXYZ neo Demo
4306970.description:
Stop an alien invasion using your fellow aliens!

Deploy your allies and prevent hostile extraterrestrials from conquering Earth.

Simple controls! Deploy your alien allies in response to enemy advances.

Issue commands in real time and protect the protagonist from waves of incoming enemies!

Defeat all enemies to clear the stage!

Feature ① The Defense Target Can Move!

Unlike traditional tower defense games, the defense target can move freely!
Not only must you consider enemy routes, but also plan escape paths for the protagonist—strategic possibilities are endless!
You might even lure enemies in and wipe them out in one fell swoop!

Feature ② Turn the Tables with Powerful Special Moves!

Each character possesses a powerful special move that can drastically change the tide of battle!
Activate them at critical moments or when you want to annihilate enemies all at once!

Feature ③ Switch Jobs Anytime!

Your alien allies can change jobs during battle!
Adapt to the situation by switching between three roles: melee, ranged, and support.

The story is a completely original scenario created by manga artist Rensuke Oshikiri!
All characters are fully illustrated exclusively for this game!
Experience a brand-new Oshikiri world that can only be found here!

The insert song for GALAXYZ neo, titled “GALAXYZ,” is

performed by Sasaki Rico, an artist signed to TV ASAHI MUSIC!

The protagonist awakens in a hospital, having lost all of his memories.

Confused and unable to recall even his own name, he is approached by a mysterious boy named Rui.

Rui claims to be a relative and tells him to call if he ever needs help—then disappears.

Thanks to the kindness of Kaname Asayama, whom he befriended during his hospitalization, the protagonist moves into an apartment run by the Asayama family. Hoping to uncover his past, he heads into the city in search of Rui.

Though his memories are gone, he believes that slowly reclaiming a normal life might be enough…

But that fragile peace is shattered when he is confronted by a group of men in the city.

To his shock, they attack him using supernatural powers known as Esper abilities. Overwhelmed by fear, the protagonist awakens to his own power—the ability to Summon.

The summoned girl, Aviore, looks at him and declares

“Prince! You’ve summoned me at last!”

And so, his brief return to ordinary life comes to an end.

The boy is thrust into battle.

This is the story of a young man who fights to protect the Earth.
4306970.supported_languages:
英语, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
